txt.en: 'Mithrandir has asked for many texts concerning the Dwarves of Moria.'
'Mithrandir and Elrond have been poring over maps of the Misty Mountains for days.'
'I am afraid I am quite busy with the current requests of Mithrandir and Master Elrond to assist you.'
'Much of the lore and poetry of Eregion has been preserved here by Master Elrond.'
